body:
Comment 1 by **stephenm@golang.org**: 
It looks like the tests are running against an old version of the compiler, not the
latest version.

What is $GOBIN set to?

What does the following command output?

$ env PATH=/bin:/usr/bin:/usr/local/bin:${GOBIN:-$HOME/bin} sh -c "/bin/ls -l $(which
6g)"
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
